title: For the people residing in the project area, an efficient and timely public transportation system up to the nearest public transportation station / hub / depot / stand
clause_text: For the people residing in the project area, an efficient and timely public transportation system up to the nearest public transportation station / hub / depot / stand. He shall develop it himself or tie with Government / Semi Government (1) / Planning Authority or private transport agency for such efficient public transportation. The number of buses and trips will be decided by MSRTC / Local Transport Authority;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
